info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 27 at 12:40AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Rock Island, southern Whiteside, northern Henry, northwestern Bureau and eastern Scott Counties through 115 AM CST... At 1239 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Osborn, or 11 miles east of East Moline, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Erie around 1245 AM CST. Hooppole around 1250 AM CST. Prophetstown and Tampico around 1255 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Deer Grove and Walnut. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 74 in Illinois near mile marker 14. Interstate 88 between mile markers 1 and 13, and between mile markers 39 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
